extendedInfo.description: PLEASE NOTEIf you are having trouble registering with the app, please follow the steps below:(Applicable to Android 4.x / Ice Cream Sandwich, when connecting over 3G â network dependent)(Note that this could affect your data connection on the device for other applications, ensure that you write the current settings down)1 - Select âSettingsâ2 - Under âWireless and networkâ, select âMoreâ¦â3 - Select âMobile Networksâ3 - Select âAccess Point Namesâ4 - Open the currently selected APN5 - Clear the âProxyâ settings (write this down in case you need to change back later)6 - Clear the âPortâ setting (write this down in case you need to change back later)7 - Press the Back button to save your changes8 - Restart the deviceLooking for product information in an Edgars Store has never been easier. Simply type in the barcode or use our built in scanning system which leverages your camera to automatically scan and decipher the barcode. We will find the product, what the latest price is, how many items are available in your favourite or nearby stores with the corresponding stock levels.**Order ProductsYou can rapidly order any product you have scanned and deliver it directly to your favourite store. Login with your Edgars account details, pick your favourite store, choose the products you wish to order and youâre done. Those products will be delivered to your favourite store to pick up at your earliest convenience.**Find VariantsTo alleviate the frustrations of not being able to get your hands on an out of stock item Edgars SmartApp Variants enable you to find any alternative size for any scanned product. Say the stunning jeans you want are too small and the size that will fit is out of stock. This would be a major problem before but now just scan smaller jeans and with variants you will have an option to select the alternative size you want. Once selected you will be displayed product information, stock availability at nearby stores, with the option to order it to your favourite store to pick up later.**Check BalanceOne of the biggest desires for Edgars account holders, is to check your current balance in real time. This is now possible to do with Edgars SmartApp. Log in and you can immediately view your current balance, credit limit and available spend amount. Also included is your instalment amount to make things even easier.***Find StoreYou can easily pinpoint the closest Edgars Store to your current location. Alternatively if you are looking for something more specific, you will be able find any Edgars Store in the country, their address and phone number. If you need a little extra help you can view the store on a map and even get directions from anywhere you are to an Edgars doorstep.**Like on FacebookWith our seamless Facebook integration, you can now share with all your friends the exciting new purchase you have just made, get opinions on items you are thinking of buying or just to let them know which Edgars Stores you love to shop at. With Edgars SmartApp you can connect to the world with a push of a button.**Check Thank U PointsYou can now check how many Thank U points you have accumulated with our new Thank U rewards program.Android Versions supported- 2.2 to 4.0.3

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t even log in (logging in is a \"Setting\", by the way). Not worth my time discussing further issues.
reviews.author: Brian Tristam Williams

reviews.title: Crashes on login
reviews.comment: Cant log in and apart from that the app doesnt seem useful at all. I will definitely not stand in store and scan barcodes to make an order. Add catalogues and the ability to buy from them the we are talking. There is no reason that the current features should have to be in an app.
reviews.author: Renier Kriel

reviews.comment: Its bull, when edgars S.africa dont even know that there even is a app???\tWaste of time if u in S.A
reviews.author: Michael Evaristo\' Foxley

reviews.title: App crashes
reviews.comment: This app crashes after saying logged in successfully. When I click ok, it crashes!
reviews.author: Nicole J

reviews.title: No access to my edgars account
reviews.comment: I followed the instructions and it said it could take a while to link my edgars account. However I figure several weeks and it is still not working means that something is wrong. Seen this is probably the most important feature of this app, it is now pointless.
reviews.author: Eugene bawden

reviews.title: Stops working
reviews.comment: After loging app stops working. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jean-Pierre Bester

reviews.title: What in the world is this?
reviews.comment: Since when is your password displayed when registerig, what\'s the use of a password if everyone can see it? And what can\'t it validated my account but it accepted it when I was registering, am I missing something?
reviews.author: Anele Mgcini Mdolomba

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: User interface is terrible.  Lessons should be learnt from the Woolworths app. Needs great improvement.
reviews.author: Ajith Dhani

reviews.title: Log in crash
reviews.comment: Useless app. Did u even attemp to test the features when creating. Im deleting this crap
reviews.author: Jon Munro

reviews.title: Crash on Login
reviews.comment: When I click the \"OK\" button on the \"Login successful\" dialog, the app crashes.
reviews.author: Houston Pillay

reviews.title: No good!
reviews.comment: Like so many other comments, app stops working when I try to register.
reviews.author: Stephen Holgate

reviews.title: Mr Ali.
reviews.comment: Works well now on my Galaxy Note. Disable Proxy and Port in the Settings...Mobile Networks.....Access Points......Save...Restart Phone....then register on the application.......To be able to view your account details call customer care to activate it for you.
reviews.author: maulana ali

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: App crashes all the time on S4. Absolutely no use.

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: What\'s the point if login does not work?

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Poor app

reviews.comment: It does not work!

reviews.title: Fix register force close
reviews.comment: Force closes when I try to register.  Both on Galaxy S2 and Galaxy S3 mini

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I wanna work for r u guys because I\'m so impressed with this app, simple yet so brilliant. I just hope more retailers follow suit

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best app ever..I love tht it tells u how much stock is available.   Scan didn\'t work even with my S3 camera but typing the code worked.

reviews.title: Dumb app
reviews.comment: What u were tryin 2 do on makin this stupid app? Were u tryin 2 copy Foursquare, Amazon... or what? U r not a good copying machine... Ur poor app is inactive... Don\'t make crap apps for our favourite shop
